properties.name: tc.clients.update-interval
properties.description: Interval in millis between provider status(UP/DOWN) update, when someone is viewing page

properties.name: tc.clients.min-update-interval
properties.description: How frequent in milliseconds can status update be invoked, whether manual or automatic controlled by tc.clients.update-interval

properties.name: tc.clients.default
properties.description: Name of defualt provider. For now two certainly available names are: thepiratebay.org and automatic

properties.name: tc.proxy-server.url
properties.description: Url for the proxy list service

properties.name: tc.clients.update-clients.paralellism
properties.description: Parallelism level for refreshing clients' up status

properties.name: spring.mongodb.embedded.artifact.storage-path
properties.description: Determines where to download and extract embedded mongodb binaries

properties.name: tc.clients.update-on-startup
properties.description: Whether update up status of clients on start up or not
